text: Tomadera rabera anugraha sandhana karate tomadera kono papa ne'i [1]. Sutaram yakhana tomara ‘araphata [2] hate phire asabe [3] takhana masa’arula haramera [4] kache paumche allah‌ke smarana karabe ebam tini yebhabe siksa diyechena thika sebhabe tamke smarana karabe. Yadi'o era age [5] tomara bibhrantadera antarbhukta chile
